item.title: I Wanna Maker
item.description:
About This Game

I Wanna Maker is a precision platformer with a robust level editor and online level sharing, based on I Wanna Be The Guy fangames.

Create complex levels using a wide variety of objects, a powerful events system, and customizable visuals. Browse levels online, traverse a hand-crafted campaign, take on challenge modes, and more!

Level Editor Features

  • Intuitive but powerful level editor with 70+ objects
  • A flexible events system which enables endless possibilities
  • Dozens of visuals for blocks, spikes, and backgrounds, each color-customizable
  • 150+ songs to choose from
  • Props, lights, and particles to visually enhance your levels
  • Add optional objectives to your levels with collectible gems

Gameplay Features

  • Play 240,000+ user-created levels made for a variety of skill levels
  • Speedrun leaderboards for each level with watchable replays
  • Campaign mode with dozens of high-quality levels
  • Incredibly precise and responsive controls
  • Take on challenge modes consisting of randomly chosen levels
  • Save levels to custom playlists and share them online
  • Follow your favorite makers so you don't miss their new levels
  • Customize your character's appearance

No monetization

I Wanna Maker is free to play, with no monetization of any kind. We hope you enjoy making levels and participating in the community!

item.title: Dungeons 4
item.description:
About This Game

Once upon a time in a realm far, far away, everything was lush and green. The unicorns mingled among the trees and the elves and humans lived peacefully in harmony with their surroundings. Yet somewhere at the edge of a clearing half-hidden among the trees, obscured by a rising veil of fog in the hazy half-darkness of a weather-beaten hut, a shape huddles over a large and ominously glowing crystal ball. A mumbling voice sings ancient formulae, urging the swirling glowing mists inside the crystal to part and give an insight into the future.

‚ÄúAll is in flux, nothing seems certain. Come, oh vagaries of space and time, separate the veil and show us what is yet to come‚Äù, the voice grumbles with the hint of an eye faintly reflecting the glow in front of its hood. The shape‚Äôs audience, only barely visible in the dim light, leans in closer and listens intently. ‚ÄúTime ebbs and flows, forming pools and wrinkles‚Ä¶ but when the mists part only vague images rise from beyond the veil. Shhhh‚Äîdon‚Äôt come too close, you don‚Äôt want to disturb my delicate magical weavings do you?‚Äù The shape, still bent over the orb, mutters and shoos the other back a bit more into the shadows. ‚ÄúAh, now it seems to be clearing a little. I can see‚Ä¶ something‚Ä¶ several somethings, hints of voices echoing in the haze. A baby, something happening on Hill Doom and the coming together of the Council of Snots ‚Äì what could all this mean?‚Äù

In a flash, the light reflected in the eye turns red and a distant evil laughter echoes through the woods. Stay tuned for the return of the Soothsaying Evil!



The Absolute Evil and its trusted *cough* servant, the Dark Elf Thalya, return in Dungeons 4 after the events of its fabulous predecessor to bring about their triumph over the forces of good once more.

Build a cozy and comfortable Dungeon to suit your creatures‚Äô needs and rule over them, then send them out into the Overworld to kindly remind the good people living there that the Absolute Evil rules over their lands. Gather your Evilness in new and dynamic ways and unleash it upon the lush green forests and plains of the Overworld to turn them over to the dark side. But make sure that your Dungeon is well-secured by traps and defended by your creatures, for those pesky Overworlders won‚Äôt just twiddle their thumbs while you turn their land into the Absolute Evil‚Äôs most pleasurable holiday paradise.

But what is that noise? ‚ÄúGold, gold, gold and gems, gold and gems and gold!‚Äù The ancient song echoes throughout the underworld, accompanied by the clanging steel of hammers and axes. The Dwarves have arrived to claim their share of the abundant resources and together with the Elves and Humans of the Overworld, they send out their raiding parties to find the Dungeon‚Äôs heart.

Dungeons 4 keeps the spirit of its predecessor, but everything is now bigger, better, and with even more dynamic Evilness‚Ñ¢.



Everything is better with Dwarves‚Ñ¢: The Dwarves have arrived to build their underground strongholds and the hardy little fellows (although they don‚Äôt like being called that) compete with the Ever-Expanding Evil for space and resources.


It makes your Dungeon great again: Dungeons are up to four times larger than before and there are many more creatures who wait for the All-Commanding Evil‚Äôs orders to conquer the Overworld. Now the time has come for massive armies and truly sprawling dungeons!


Ripe for the taking: The Overworld is bigger than ever before. Gain Evilness by beating Mini Bosses like the obsessively harmonious Unicorn and use it to transform the Overworld into stunning biomes of pure evil.


New and shiny: An ability-based Perk system for Thalya, the Absolute Evil‚Äôs trusted *cough* and most loyal subordinate, grants her impressive new powers. The Absolute Evil can now enjoy taking over the world, governing the creatures and slapping subordinates even more with the customizable Evil Hand.


Minions, everywhere: The Horde, the Undead and the Demons wait to do the Absolute Evil‚Äôs bidding, with more creatures than ever eagerly following the gesturing Evil‚Äôs orders, and Snots will play a much more prominent role this time.


Many ways to tell the story: A long campaign, narrated by the beloved English Narrator from previous titles, as well as several skirmish maps all to challenge your rule as the Absolute Evil.


Change the world: Spread your Evilness across the Overworld to bring lush and green environments over to the dark side, now shining even more vibrantly and beautifully evil as you spread your evilness across many new biomes.


Work together, slay together: 2-player co-op multiplayer with both players managing one Dungeon together. All maps from the skirmish mode and the campaign are playable in co-op.

item.title: Risk of Rain Returns
item.description:
About This Game


Carefully designed, beautifully remastered, and loaded with new ways to play‚ÄîRisk of Rain is back and better than ever! Dive into the iconic roguelike full of unique loot combinations, entirely new Survivors, overhauled multiplayer, and more!



Hone your skills and abilities, discover new Survivors, and dive into progressively stronger runs! Discover secrets of ancient design lying dormant beneath the surface of Petrichor V. Search under every log, stone, and Gup to find new ways to play!



Many Survivors fled the mysterious attack on your ship. Slice, dice, and serve justice cold with the return of Chef, hold the front line and shield your team as Enforcer, or lay down a path of toxic sludge as everybody‚Äôs favorite purple monster: Acrid! Forge new paths to explore with 15 unique Survivors, each with new abilities to master. Two entirely new Survivors are making their debut in Risk of Rain Returns.

Also introducing The Drifter! This resourceful brawler gathers scrap from conquered foes and can spawn items that temporarily empower teammates. She can also take them for herself and unleash an unbridled blaze of area-wide destruction. The Drifter is the perfect addition to any group of Survivors. Her ability to support the team while laying down her own brand of hurt will prove she‚Äôs more than just a stowaway.



Drop to the surface solo or with your crew! Choose Survivors that complement each other‚Äôs strengths and weaknesses, or go wild and choose whoever has the largest guns (spoiler: it‚Äôs Loader). With up to four-player online and couch co-op, you‚Äôre not alone in this fight.

Risk of Rain Returns features new and improved multiplayer services to ensure the only thing that gets between your crew‚Äôs survival are the ever-growing hordes on Petrichor V.



Fight your way to the surface while uncovering precious cargo. These items serve as your redemption, helping you move faster, deal more damage, or jump a little higher. Still others empower you in more dramatic ways‚Äîlike the rare Ukulele, which empowers your attacks with electrifying music.

If explosions are what you‚Äôre after, hunt down the Brilliant Behemoth and watch as even your most mundane attacks erupt in a barrage of beautiful blasts. The magic comes in the unpredictable combinations you create. Exploding chain lightning is only the beginning of your frenetic masterpiece!



The denizens of Petrichor V are as diverse as the many planets they once called home. As these monsters approached extinction on their own worlds, a mysterious force brought them to Petrichor V. The planet quickly grew to be a menagerie of the most dangerous monsters in the galaxy, and they‚Äôre not thrilled by interlopers (aka YOU).



Variety is the spice of destruction. Select from more than 10 Artifacts that each mutate your run! Perhaps you‚Äôd like to start with a random equipment item that changes every time it‚Äôs used, or maybe you‚Äôd like to experience a rampant Imp invasion every 10 minutes. Play around with combinations of Artifacts and discover exciting new ways to play.

item.title: Cobalt Core
item.description:
About This Game



Cobalt Core is a sci-fi roguelike deckbuilder with a unique single-axis combat system that will throw you for a loop. Many loops!



Give orders to your crew by playing cards: Will you raise shields to protect your ship, dodge incoming missiles and cannon fire to avoid damage outright, or strike preemptively to disable your enemy‚Äôs weapons? Outmaneuver your foes to stay just ahead of impending calamity, and reach the Cobalt Core!



  • Fresh new spin on tactics ‚Äì dodge attacks and target weak points in this unique single-axis take on tactics combat. Outwit the enemy in a high stakes game of cat and mouse!
  • Customize your deck ‚Äì hundreds of cards and split upgrade paths means no two runs will be the same. Find that perfect combo that brings your deck from powerful to overpowered.
  • Get to know your crew ‚Äì each character comes with a completely unique playstyle and their own personal story. Bring 3 along, mix and match their decks, and see how these little goobers get along with each other.
  • Tons of replayability ‚Äì hundreds of different character+ship combinations before you even hit ‚Äústart run‚Äù. Crank up the difficulty and really test your skills!
  • Forward momentum ‚Äì untangle a narrative and unlock more playstyles as you go. Is there any escape from this time loop?



By the makers of Sunshine Heavy Industries, recipient of IGF's Honorable Mention for Excellence in Design 2022.

item.title: Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name
item.description:
About This Game

DELUXE EDITION INCLUDES:

  • Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name
  • Legendary Fighter Pack



Floating in the bay, away from the prying eyes of the public, is a mysterious container ship known as the Castle. At its center lies the Coliseum, and three legendary yakuza have entered the battle arena as playable characters.

Enter the Coliseum and play as or alongside:

  • Goro Majima ‚Äì The Mad Dog of Shimano
  • Taiga Saejima ‚Äì The Slayer of Eighteen
  • Daigo Dojima ‚Äì 6th Chairman of the Tojo Clan

Claim victory with these allies in the ultimate showdown!

ERASE YOUR PAST TO PROTECT YOUR FUTURE
Once a legendary yakuza, Kazuma Kiryu faked his own death and abandoned his name for the sake of protecting his family. Now, he is thrust into conflict by a mysterious figure attempting to drive him out of hiding.

Under the codename ‚ÄúJoryu,‚Äù Kiryu embarks on a gripping action narrative with bone-shattering combat in vibrant locations filled with exciting characters and activities.

ULTIMATE COMBAT WITH TWO HIGH-IMPACT FIGHTING STYLES

Dynamically switch between the Yakuza and Agent fighting styles in visceral melee combat.

With the Yakuza style, strike fear into enemies by unleashing wildly aggressive moves powered by Kiryu‚Äôs unparalleled strength and flair.

Or up the ante with the Agent style by delivering blows with absolute speed and precision, while using an array of high-tech gadgets like electrified bind wires to stun enemies then send them flying.



Strategically adapt to the situation and leverage both styles to dominate and destroy hordes of enemies.

ENDLESS ENTERTAINMENT



Whether you're brawling in the secret Battle arena, singing a new karaoke song, enjoying a drink at the live-action cabaret club, or racing in the pocket circuit, the world offers a variety of immersive experiences.

An intriguing informant named Akame also provides thrilling sub-missions, drawing you into an epic showdown that unfolds the more you explore and enjoy Sotenbori and Yokohama.

LIKE A DRAGON: INFINITE WEALTH SPECIAL TRIAL VERSION ALSO INCLUDED!
After completing Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name game, a Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth Special Trial Version will be unlocked for you to enjoy!


This game may be updated over time and have paid for and free additional content released for it. Please be aware that this may increase the minimum requirements for running the game above the specification stated here

English voice will be implemented in a post-launch patch distribution

item.title: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2
item.description:
About This Game



Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 lets you duke it out with the biggest and best fighting character roster yet, including all new characters like SpongeBob SquarePants, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Squidward Tentacles, Jimmy Neutron, and more!

Choose your favorite brawlers, master their unique move sets, and use all-new powerful Supers to land the finishing blow with friends or across a unique, roguelike player campaign!



Featuring:
‚Ä¢ New Single-Player Campaign: Put your skills to the test as you fight to stop Danny Phantom archvillain Vlad Plasmius from taking over the Nickelodeon universe!



‚Ä¢ All-New Gameplay: New and revamped visuals meets new audio, animations, modes, stages, mechanics, taunts and move sets for all levels of play!



‚Ä¢ Cinematic Supers: Power up your fighters with incredible new animated supers to deal devastating blows to your opponents!



‚Ä¢ New & Improved Brawlers: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2‚Äôs roster is better than ever, with even more variety in how each unique character plays. Battle with brand new Nickelodeon fighters as well as returning fan favorites!

item.title: Stronghold: Definitive Edition
item.description:
About This Game

Relive the glory of Stronghold, the original BAFTA-nominated real-time strategy game, with this new definitive edition of the classic 'castle sim'. Witness the game that started it all, carefully rebuilt using the source artwork, remastered music, returning voice talent and veteran developers of the first entry in this legendary series.

UNITE A BROKEN REALM


Welcome to the fractured, war-torn frontier of medieval England. With the King betrayed by his treacherous lords and a realm on the brink of collapse, take control of scattered forces and reunite your kingdom against the monstrous Rat, Pig, Snake and Wolf!

Strike down each villainous Lord in missions ranging from breaking sieges and capturing enemy castles to building epic fortresses and repelling enemy assaults. Test the limits of your strategic mind with castle assaults and grand banquets in military and economic campaigns.

Dive into classic RTS and city builder gameplay now elevated with remade graphics, community requested features and remastered music from series maestro Robert L. Euvino. Gather resources, construct mighty castles, protect your townsfolk, manage your gold, raise armies and wage all out war!

A LEGEND RETOLD


Building on its 20 year legacy, Stronghold: Definitive Edition features two classic campaigns told across 26 missions, alongside fresh single player content in the form of a new narrative campaign designed by Firefly Studios founders Simon Bradbury and Eric Ouellette.

Exclusive to the definitive edition, this new 14 mission campaign sees players march across the devastated English hinterland in search of Sir Longarm's captured kin, before venturing beyond the story in a challenging new historical 'Castle Trail' of 10 unique scenarios.

With remade artwork, a higher fidelity soundtrack, full Steam multiplayer support for 8 players, Steam Workshop, modernised gameplay and more, Stronghold: Definitive Edition is the ultimate way to experience the game that started it all. Your kingdom awaits!

NEW FEATURES

  • ZOOM INTO NEW VISUALS remade by the original artists with improved animations, textures and lighting.
  • REMATCH CLASSIC VILLAINS as you hunt The Rat and The Snake in a challenging new 14 mission campaign.
  • BATTLE OLD FRIENDS on Steam with 8 player multiplayer support and extra maps on which to wage war!
  • RELIVE HISTORY in a new Castle Trail with 10 challenging siege scenarios and famous historical fortresses.
  • LOSE YOURSELF in a remastered soundtrack, with fresh recordings from some of the game's original voice actors.
  • CREATE, SHARE & ENJOY new Stronghold community content with Steam Workshop support.

item.title: Roboquest
item.description:
About This Game



Roboquest is a fast-paced FPS with Roguelite mechanics playable in singleplayer or 2 players co-op.

Shoot and run your way through randomly generated environments, pick-up upgrades along the way and blast the powerful big bad bosses you encounter.

Upgrade your basecamp and unlock persistent upgrades to customize your playstyle and dive further on each subsequent run.







Fast Movement ‚Äì Master the frantic movement mechanics in order to run and jump through the levels with evasive maneuvers against the enemy bullet-hell.

Guardian Classes ‚Äì Choose from several classes: lead your army of drones, blast tons of enemies at once with a powerful rocket or stealth-in for a sudden burst attack.

Build Customization - Create your build along the way with unique sets of upgrades for each class, find powerful synergies and further personalize your playstyle.

Weapon Diversity ‚Äì From regular shotguns, rifles and snipers to the almighty mortar and flare gun, Roboquest offers a large diversity of weapons to choose from.

Random Levels ‚Äì Each with a different theme and atmosphere, generated with a careful mix of pre-placed and randomized chunks, the levels offer a fresh challenge each run.

Run, fall, run again ‚Äì Tough challenges await you, and mastery is required. Learn the way of the enemy and master movement and shooting to prevail. Prepare to return to your basecamp if you are destroyed by the evil bots.

Persistent Upgrades ‚Äì Collect wrenches during your runs and use them to upgrade your basecamp and unlock new gameplay elements and choices to help you dive further into the game each run.

Singleplayer or 2p-Coop ‚Äì Dive into the fray alone or in 2-player co-op with your brobot (and find even more brobots with the cross-platform and the public matchmaking).

Polished experience ‚Äì Responsive input system with many quality-of-life ‚Äòunder-the-radar‚Äô features to make it as fluid as possible and make sure nothing comes in your way when unleashing havoc on the badbots.

Original Soundtrack ‚Äì High octane, custom-tailored soundtrack supports the fast gameplay and robot-smashing action.







The year is 2700. Humans live scattered through the desert, struggling to survive. It‚Äôs looking pretty bleak.
Until a young scavenger girl named Max stumbles across an old Guardian robot, laying abandoned in the sand. She reactivates him, knowing that with a Guardian by her side, she may be able to give mankind a fighting chance‚Ä¶
Together, the two begin to explore the mysterious canyons that surround them, searching for answers and a way to survive.
There‚Äôs just one problem. The canyons are crawling with evil bots, determined to stop them from advancing. But who are they? And what are they guarding?

item.title: Run Ran! side scrollers
item.description:
About This Game

Random stage generation. The length of the stages can be freely determined.

Randomly generated stages

A stage consists of several blocks. The player can only specify the length of the stage. What the stage configuration will be like is left to be seen after it is created.

Time Attack

You can record your best time for each stage length. Challenge your limits!

Gamer's "Ouch!" is reflected on the screen

It hurts. Very much so.

Flying objects

Various objects are flying from all over the place. The way to deal with them depends on the object, so the player's judgment and quickness may be tested.

About updates

We plan to update the game from time to time after its release. New blocks, flying objects, and other things that will make the game more interesting.

item.title: The Curse of the Egyptian Pyramid "Remaster Edition"
item.description:
About This Game

Under the control of a mysterious organization, two scientists with experience in research missions are sent to Egypt. According to rumors: in one of the places of Egypt there was a monstrous earthquake, and a mysterious pyramid appeared out of nowhere at the crash site. From all nearby settlements, one by one, people began to mysteriously disappear. All sorts of attempts to study the inside of the pyramid ended in failure, because no research expedition returned back. Now two researchers with good work experience will have to explore the pyramid, taking with them devices that can protect them from dangers.

The player is provided with several unique opportunities and solutions to situations.
  • Neon sticks. You have 10 sticks with you. Discarded sticks can be picked up. Use them to light your way, not get lost in mazes and much more.
  • Journal. Characters often write down the tasks they need to complete there. Also, they mark themselves with hints that can help the player advance further.
  • Cameras with an ultrasonic barrier. Using these cameras, the player will be able to see spirits, ghosts and anomalies. If the ghost is weak, then the player can adopt an USB (UltraSonic Barrier) that is able to expel or kill evil spirits. Note: If you see a creature without cameras, run! Such a creature cannot be driven away.
  • Hide and seek. To avoid or hide from the chase from some enemies, use shelters.

item.title: Temple Guy - Quest for chest
item.description:
About This Game

"YOU WILL NEVER REACH THE TOP OF THIS TEMPLE!!!


"Temple Guy's Quest for the chest" is a 2d-precision platformer.
Climb the Temple of Despair and grab the chest!
Can you make it to the top? - I don't think you can!



Don't get too impatient! Every jump is significant!
Keep calm and show perseverance!

item.title: Twistingo: Hummingbird Haven Collector's Edition
item.description:
About This Game

Set off on a heartwarming journey in 'Twistingo: Hummingbird Haven,' where nature's beauty meets puzzle-solving fun! A solar eclipse and a storm have endangered the island's hummingbirds. Your task is to find them, rebuild their homes, and restore the island's charm. Engage in hidden object searches, complete puzzles, gather unique amulets and revel in the stories of the local community. Join this memorable quest to save Hummingbird Haven

item.title: ÂÖÉÂç°ÁâåMetaCard
item.description:
About This Game

Meta Card 2 is now available on Steam

The world's first card + survivor + tower defense
Control two characters at the same time, play cards, play Qiuqiu, innovative experience, no replacement in the entire network!

Click the link below to add it to your wish list!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2669440/2__MetaCard2

Building cards that can control two characters


The world's first construction card game that can simultaneously control two characters with independent decks.

A different role system at the bottom


Based on the underlying setting of "Slaying the Spire", fans of "Slaying the Spire" subjectively feel that the characters in "Slaying the Spire" have different card libraries and initial relics, and there is no difference in the bottom layer.

Even each character uses armor as a means of defense, and each character gets a fixed fee every round.

So on this basis, this product is based on the design concept that the bottom layer of each character is different.

Of course, in order for players to get started quickly, the underlying logic of the first character fighter is the same as that of "Slaying the Spire".

But the second character mage is different. The mage has an initial 99 mana points, but it will only be full at the beginning of the chapter.

So in the rest of the time, you need to rely on cards and artifacts to recover blue, which is a role that pays more attention to long-term operations.

And the mage also has the special entry of casting spells, the details can be experienced in the game.

The third character, Voidwalker, is the first character in the world to add real-time combat elements to an original turn-based game, because the energy of Voidwalker is time.

Therefore, each round has an initial time of 25 seconds. When the time passes naturally, the round will automatically end.

And the player needs to make a strategic judgment within 25 seconds and use your cards.

Note: The cost consumed by your card is also time!

And Voidwalker has a special card that can be used in the enemy's turn, and can use [Time and Space Guardian] at the moment of the enemy's attack, so as to achieve an effect similar to that of a knife.

Of course, if you don't like this genre that tests reaction and operation, you can also try the unique hang-up flow of Voidwalker, and you can achieve output and recovery by standing still.

Continuous update


Although it is only a product made by one person, I have been insisting on updating it.
The current version has almost no BUG, and the overall trend is stable. At the request of fans, steam achievements and cloud saves have been implemented.
In terms of content, there are currently 28 general-purpose artifacts, 30 warrior-specific artifacts, 24 mage-specific artifacts, and 20 voidwalker-specific artifacts.
There are 82 cards for fighters, 66 cards for mages, and 41 cards for voidwalkers.
Moreover, a lot of special effects have been added to the cards and BUFF, and you are welcome to experience it in the game.
If you have any feedback, you can also comment and leave a message. Your praise is my greatest encouragement.
Follow-up will be the development of the summoning style of the Voidwalker. If you have good ideas, please leave a comment~

item.title: Lord of Darkness: Aftermath
item.description:
About This Game

Lord of Darkness: Aftermath is the second game in the Lord of Darkness series, made in a similar pixel style and JRPG genre. Together with the blue-haired hero and his friends, we have to go on crazy adventures, because the world is in serious danger again. You will overcome many dungeons and defeat many bosses, and terrible secrets will be solved.

This part is also replete with cliches of classic JRPG games, while providing unexpected twists and an interesting plot. Not without well-chosen music, which will give a feeling of nostalgia for your favorite genre.

Our hero is an ordinary village guy who lives with his father, who sells in his shop. But after unexpected terrible events, he will have a great adventure full of new acquaintances and dangers. And which ones, you will find out in a personal adventure!

item.title: The Maze Contract
item.description:
About This Game

Features:
  • 1980s arcade game action mixed with tactical elements and upgrades.
  • Vector-style graphics.
  • 26 unique levels to explore.
  • High-score tables.
  • Destroy your enemies and take their weapons.
  • Collect upgrade containers, boost your ship's shield, thrusters and armor, and upgrade your weapons.
  • 8 unique weapons + hyperspace/teleport to take you out of sticky situations.
  • Tactical elements: choose your routes carefully, pick the best weapon to use in each situation, try to pit the two enemy factions against each other.

item.title: Mysterious legend
item.description:
About This Game

This is a very adventurous exploration game.
On the journey, players have the identity of a traveler and will encounter various obstacles along the way. You need to use the Ctrl key to fly to the appropriate altitude to obtain coins or avoid obstacles.
The longer the road section, the more obstacles there will be on the road. When playing, it is important to control the coordination between keyboards to make the characters run farther.
You can run on the ground or fly in the sky, continuously flying at appropriate heights to showcase your style.

item.title: Nightly Maintenance
item.description:
About This Game

Nightly Maintenance is a single player psychological horror hidden object game that will take you on a journey through a creepy and abandoned factory. As Malcom, the maintenance worker, your task is to complete three randomly assigned tasks each night, but beware - an oversized and mysterious mannequin is watching your every move.

The tasks are not your typical maintenance duties and will require you to solve puzzles, find hidden objects, and navigate the dark and eerie factory to complete them. You may be tasked with testing all the light switches, picking up scattered pallets, or even ordering a pizza, but each task presents its own set of challenges and obstacles to overcome.

But that's not the only thing you need to worry about. The mannequin, with its haunting presence and malevolent gaze, adds a layer of tension and unease to your journey. You'll need to be quick and smart to avoid its wrath and complete your tasks without being caught.

As you progress through the game, the twists and turns of the factory's dark and twisted backstory will slowly be revealed. With immersive gameplay, atmospheric visuals and sound, and a gripping story that will keep you on the edge of your seat, Nightly Maintenance promises to be a chilling and unforgettable experience. So, if you're brave enough to face your fears and unravel the mystery of the abandoned factory, then step into Malcom's shoes and see where the night takes you.

Notable Features
  • Randomized tasks
  • Unique Gameplay each round
  • Replayability

item.title: Cyberference
item.description:
About This Game



Cyberference is an old school first person shooter. You won't find weapon load outs or regenerating health here. Instead you'll have to find your weapons and health pickups. Cyberference keeps things simple and keeps the action coming!

Story

When the player runs across a terrorist organization, it isn't enough for him to just save the day then and there. Instead, you have to hunt this organization down and find its leader. This will lead you to interfere with one of civilization's greatest threats, a virus that takes control of robots!

Features


  • A story mode that can be played in single player or cooperatively.
  • Arcade mode where players race to get the most kills
  • Vs. Mode where players fight against each other.
  • Local Multiplayer supporting 4 players
  • Split screen or Dual Monitor Support
  • Various weapons such as a shotgun, sniper rifle, and grenade launcher.

Dual Monitor Support


If you have two displays connected to your computer than you can utilize both of them in multiplayer. Rather than sharing a screen with a friend, the game will devote one screen to each player, bringing the most out of the local multiplayer experience.

item.title: ICHARKO
item.description:
About This Game



In Icharko you will have to fight the enemies right in the rear, step by step overcoming the tasks at hand. You are a soldier defending your country from invasion. Using exclusive weapons, you will be able to influence the course of the fighting, taking place in the most difficult times of your country.

This is a single-player game in which you will visit many places and take part in various combat conflicts, playing the role of a militia military group in the most dangerous operations to defend your country. If you are killed, captured or detained, only your family will remember your existence. The whole plot is accompanied by an old man, who tells us about the military actions taking place in the 2000s, in which our protagonist participated. The old man will tell us about the bravery and courage in the military actions of the main character - Adam. All this in a first-person shooter.

History tells us about countries that started to take over each other. Large powers began to capture small countries, as they were defenseless and unarmed. This affected the protagonist as well. Plunge into the world of fighting, where an ordinary infantryman was able to affect a small part of faith in people. In the story there is a battle between the Fifth Order and the Order of the Legacy, where the army of the Fifth Order leads the capture of the land of the protagonist, and the Order of the Legacy is an army of militias that defend their land, which includes the protagonist.

Become that military hero- go through step-by-step tests, be tactful and think over every step before you go into the fray. Get a taste of the warfare of the 2000s, where major powers began to take over the lands of smaller countries.

In the game you can expect:


  • Warfare in the period of the 2000s
  • The storyline is accompanied by a coworker of the protagonist

  • Weapon customization

  • Nice graphics

  • Four levels of difficulty

item.title: Graveyard Shift
item.description:
About This Game

Guarding the graveyard shift is often considered one of the most terrifying jobs globally, but night guarding at Whispering Winds Cemetery surpasses any other cemetery in horror! Being Night Security in this place will turn into a nightmare for you that you may never forget.



You play as a character named Gary, who must go to Whispering Winds Cemetery for his first workday and guard it from 5 PM to 8 AM the next day.

Initially, everything seems calm, but shortly after, conditions change, and gradually, the cemetery becomes a hell for Gary. Through surveillance cameras, Gary notices strange things, initially thinking they're only visible in the camera feed. However, as he walks among the graves, he realizes he must endure the most terrifying night of his life!



In creating this game, we aimed to focus on a sense of responsibility and genuine fear, rather than designing vague and tedious puzzles in the gameplay. We used realistic graphics and 3D sound to enhance the fear-inducing experience for the player.

item.title: Jewel Craft Fusion
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on an interstellar journey with "Jewel Craft Fusion," where you'll dive into the vast expanse of space, discovering shimmering treasures and unlocking ancient legends. Match precious gems, solve intriguing puzzles, and unravel cosmic secrets as you navigate through the celestial wonders of the cosmos.

Traverse the cosmic landscape, where each sparkling gem holds the key to unlocking the mysteries of the universe. Engage in the art of matching precious gems, creating breathtaking displays of brilliance against the backdrop of the cosmic void.

Challenge your puzzle-solving skills as you unveil the secrets hidden within each level. Navigate through a series of mind-bending puzzles that will test your wit and strategic prowess. Can you master the fusion of jewel crafting and puzzle solving to reveal the cosmic wonders that await?

Immerse yourself in the cosmic allure of Jewel Craft Fusion, where each gem tells a tale of cosmic riches and forgotten legends. Progress through the levels to uncover the stories behind each gem, adding depth to your cosmic journey and connecting you with the timeless secrets of the universe.

With captivating visuals, intuitive controls, and an immersive cosmic soundtrack, Jewel Craft Fusion offers a gaming experience that transcends the ordinary. Are you ready to match, fuse, and discover the cosmic mysteries hidden within the gems of the universe? Embark on this jewel-filled cosmic odyssey now!

item.title: Creative Continents
item.description:
About This Game

Discover Gaming Liberation with Creative Continents Phase III: A New Frontier in Player Empowerment

Greetings, fellow adventurers and visionaries of the gaming realm! We stand at the threshold of a new era in gaming ‚Äì an era where your creative impulses take center stage. Welcome to the latest evolution of Creative Continents, where the journey towards true gaming freedom begins.

When I embarked on the Creative Continents journey, I envisioned more than just a game. I saw a platform that would give players the ability to sculpt their own realms, craft personalized maps, and forge unforgettable experiences with friends. Today, I am thrilled to present a world where this vision has started to become reality, offering you an opportunity like no other.

Picture this: you have the power to shape the very land beneath your feet, to cultivate a landscape that resonates with your imagination. With a diverse palette of 50 land types and an array of vibrant foliage at your fingertips, your creative expressions know no bounds. But the journey doesn't halt at creation; it's an invitation to immerse yourself in a vivid third-person perspective and explore the fruits of your labor.

This experience is far from solitary. Through seamless integration with Steam Multiplayer, your friends can join you on your journey, coexisting in the world you've sculpted. In Creative Continents, the traditional barriers between developer and player dissolve. The narrative is yours to weave, and the destiny of your world lies in your capable hands.

Throughout the development of this experience, my goal has been profound: Can we, as creators, relinquish control and hand the reins of power over to you, the players? Can we pave the way for an experience where you are not just gamers, but architects of your own digital destinies?

Together, we venture into uncharted territory, a realm where creative freedom isn't a promise but a reality. Creative Continents is more than a game; it's a testament to your ingenuity, your aspirations, and your ability to reshape the landscape of gaming itself.

Together, let's uncover the true essence of player empowerment.

item.title: White Wolf - Treasure Hunter 2
item.description:
About This Game

Continue the action & adventure, in sequel were left off in the snow cave trap inside of magical chest. Now finding a way out of chest dimension universe, that you got trap in. Solve the mystery with Pirate Parrot behind the mystical chest dimension changing into all kinds of spirit animals beyond controlling Dark Wolf?!

* Over 100 levels in Action-Adventure in sequel of continuation campaign story. Prequel. (WWTH) Shock Supported Gamepad / PC / STEAMDECK

* Beat‚Äôem up your enemies with melee attacks or pickup items to destroy enemies, fire items at enemies to damage them.

* Over 25 playable characters plus vehicles mine cart, go kart, magic carpet, pirate ship and yellow submarine travel though Magic Color realms.

* Movie cinematics of level gameplay plus boss death battle finish cinematic though Magic Color Realms.

* Unlock the power ups to your spirit animal though the quest seven realms of Magic of the chest you got trapped in from first Encounter prequel.

* Leave where you left off in adventure, from (Lobby level) to save game & load game from save point from the pot item on map to open menu with three game
slots to save data ABC that load from progress campaign player left off.

* Play in third person view or in first person view game play though adventure different way enjoy game experience.

* Pick up items & collect wolf gold coins, plus pickup items can fly with in the realm maps by jump on them holding item button pickup to fly around explore
your treasure hunt Quest.

* Find the way out to next color realm level, by collecting shatter crystals pieces of the Magic Color Realm to advance to the next area, Find hunt search?!

* Enemy minions throughout the map plus mini bosses though quest in maps with big bosses battles in each realm, to unlock your power ups again for final boss
battle. First encounter.

* Bosses rematch first encounter only pick up destructive items to damage bosses, then rematch melee or pick up items to damage bosses in second encounter from powerups to face final realm boss.

* Free updates with game with DLC and Multiplayer game when ready to download TBD.

item.title: Conquered Dread
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the world of our thrilling first-person horror game, "Conquered Dread" Prepare to embark on a chilling and suspenseful journey as you navigate the treacherous depths of a mysterious cave to save your friend from an evil cult. But beware, as you must remain stealthy and outsmart a relentless red-hooded henchman who will stop at nothing to capture you.

Story:
In "Conquered Dread" you assume the role of a courageous protagonist determined to rescue your dear friend, who has fallen victim to an ominous cult lurking deep within an ancient cave. Driven by loyalty and a sense of duty, you embark on a perilous mission to bring them back from the clutches of darkness.

Setting:
The game takes place in a foreboding and eerie cave system that is as unforgiving as it is mysterious. With its labyrinthine tunnels, claustrophobic chambers, and hidden secrets, the cave becomes the backdrop for a relentless pursuit between you and the nefarious cult. Its damp and shadowy environment creates a chilling atmosphere that will keep you on the edge of your seat throughout your journey.

Gameplay:
As you delve deeper into the cave, you must employ your wit, stealth, and resourcefulness to outsmart the red-hooded henchman, a formidable adversary, and the cult's relentless enforcer. Utilize the environment to your advantage, hiding in shadows, evading traps, and solving intricate puzzles to progress further. Your survival depends on your ability to remain undetected and maneuver through the dark and treacherous terrain while uncovering the secrets of the cult's unholy rituals.

Key Features:
1. Immersive First-Person Horror: Experience the game through the eyes of the protagonist, intensifying the sense of fear and suspense.
2. Stealth and Strategy: Evade the red-hooded henchman by employing stealth tactics, carefully planning your movements, and using your environment to your advantage.
3. Atmospheric Setting: Explore a hauntingly atmospheric cave system filled with dark corners, ominous sounds, and secrets waiting to be discovered.
4. Challenging Puzzles: Encounter intricate puzzles that will test your problem-solving skills and advance your progress through the game.
5. Gripping Narrative: Unravel the dark and twisted story of the evil cult as you venture deeper into the depths of the cave.
6. Heart-Pounding Pursuit: Feel the adrenaline rush as you try to escape the clutches of the relentless red-hooded henchman, who is always one step behind you.

Are you ready to face your fears, save your friend, and survive the harrowing depths of "Conquered Dread"? Prepare yourself for a nerve-wracking and unforgettable experience that will test your courage and resilience like never before.

//This is my first game. The loading time after dying and restarting is a bit long, I apologize for that.//

item.title: Super Cave Run
item.description:
About This Game



Super Cave Run is a 2D, pixel art platform game, inspired by classic platforms and with a slightly high difficulty.

HISTORY

Hat Man worked on an excavation when he fell into a hole and now he needs your help to escape this prison.

ENVIRONMENT

The game features an environment with fixed and breakable platforms, fireballs, traps and much more.
At times you will need to rely on your skill, at others, patience and speed.

CHALLENGE

Your biggest challenge is to save our friend so he can return home.
Lose your patience, peace and tranquility by avoiding saving him from the most dangerous cave in the world.

item.title: Striving for Light: Survival
item.description:
About This Game

Experience the mysterious world of Striving for Light as an arena survival game, combining the exploration of random generated skill trees and exciting auto battle combat.

Key-Features:


  • Experiment with more than 62 skills in a procedurally expanding skilltree
  • 16 maps with different enemies, traps and multiple difficulties to unlock
  • 8 different player characters
  • 37 melee and ranged weapons to unlock
  • Over 30 unique enemies, over 30 unique bosses and 16 unique endbosses
  • Use dodge skillfully to avoid and escape attacks
  • Local Couch Coop Mode
  • Endless mode with uber bosses
  • Compete in multiple online leaderboards with seasons and private league system
  • Everything is hand drawn
  • Self-composed soundtrack with over 77 min playtime

Striving for Light: Survival is a standalone arena survival game originated from Striving for Light. We wanted to create a different player experience with a new combat and progression system. Both games can be played independently.

Check out Striving for Light


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1646790/Striving_for_Light/

item.title: Ïó∞Ïò§ÏôÄ ÏÑ∏Ïò§
item.description:
About This Game



97 choices. 28 endings.
Do you think you can experience a life with game?
It is possible if you make a number of cases.
The number of cases in the interactive game ‚ÄúYeon-oh and Seo‚Äù is 4656.
Let's start a new life.

[Synopsis]




‚ÄúHey, you couple over there! Please keep it down at campus.‚Äù
Yeon-Oh and Seo, A famous couple represents Pohang University of Science and Technology graduating class.
'Yeon-oh' runs a robot startup and 'Seo' is an outsider engineering student and s theater director.



"Yeon-oh! Our investment is confirmed!"
Yeon-oh is a university student and the CEO of , a startup which makes robots.
He started a humble business with his friends, but finally he received an investment offer from a conglomerate.



‚ÄúSeo, Would it be okay as we are now?‚Äù
Yeon-oh accepts the investment proposal and plans to go to Seoul.
Seo decides to stay in Pohang to run a theater company which is her dream.
Soon numerous temptations and conflicts bock their way.
All of this is up to your choice.



If we had made a different choices back then, what would we be like now?

How to play




Select a character
When the prologue starts, choose one character between 'Yeon-oh and Seo'.
If you choose Yeon-oh, the events will proceed from Yeon-oh's point of view, and if you choose Seo, events will proceed from Seo's point of view.
The story of ‚ÄúYeon-oh‚Äù and the story of ‚ÄúSeo‚Äù are organically linked.



2. Select the character's action or answer through the button that pops up at each turning point.
Those choices come together and determine their future.
If you don't like a choice or ending, you can get back to another selection in the past.

Game characteristics

1. The player creates the story and the ending making 97 choices
2. Organic linkage of stories for each character
3. Nonlinear multiple endings with thousands of cases and endings
4. Multi-time play

item.title: Furry Boss üíº
item.description:
About This Game

Furry Boss is a kinetic novel, which is a compilation of comedy stories about a simple clerk and his everyday work with his new boss named Vanessa.

Vanessa is quite an unusual boss - she never acts serious, likes to tease her workers and fool around with them. Apparently, our hero is quickly becoming her main target, and now he has to adapt to his new office life with this "devil boss".

FEATURES
‚Ä¢ About 2 hours of content.
‚Ä¢ Exciting stories.
‚Ä¢ HD fully original artworks.
‚Ä¢ Cute boss!

item.title: Not Burned Evil
item.description:
About This Game

The attractive and terrifying game "Got Burned Evil" is an exciting 2D horror with a side view that immerses the player in a mysterious world of tragedies and riddles. The main character, Felex, moves with a friend to a new place - a mysterious workshop. However, as soon as he begins to get used to it and go to bed, he is overtaken by an incredibly realistic nightmare.

Through this dream, Felex begins to remember past tragic events, forgotten by time. In a dream, he is faced with mystical riddles and terrible memories that his subconscious is not able to curb. Solving these riddles and studying the environment, Felex must explore himself from the inside and unravel the secrets hidden in the depths of his brain.

Be careful when you wander into this strange and mystical world of "Not Burned Evil", because every decision you make can help or take the hero into the network of his own shadows. Will you be able to uncover the mystery of the past and escape your fate?

item.title: Conjury
item.description:
About This Game

Weapon-based deck-building rogue-like

Make your way through the eternal darkness of Lumtham woods. It's a journey filled with monsters, peril, and tonnes of loot. Collect cards, weapons, and items as you make your way through this fast-paced deck building rogue-like to escape the darkness of the forest.

Features

  • 6 playable characters, each with unique abilities and gameplay
  • Roguelike gameplay and lots of replay-ability
  • Over 50 different weapons
  • Over 250 different cards to discover
  • Tonnes of different Enemies and Bosses to defeat

item.title: Girl Gunner Êû™‰πãÂ∞ëÂ•≥
item.description:
About This Game

Girl Gunner is a fun 2D shooter game with a rich weapon system, exquisite graphics, and beautiful BGM, especially bullets. Currently, there are up to 24 types! Players will play the cute girl Emily, escaping from the deserted island and breaking out of the siege.

Players will fight against various enemies in this game, including robots, humanoids, turrets, and unknown creatures. Each game has a unique challenge, with the difficulty gradually increasing from simple to challenging. Players who enjoy horizontal 2D shooting, adventure, and challenges must not miss it!

Game features:
1. The protagonist is a girl
2. Classic pixel style graphics
3. Rich weapons and weapon systems, with the ability to freely switch weapons. Currently, there are up to 24 types of weapons and bullets, making you exhilarating
4. The protagonist is no longer the type of female warrior who used to hang at a touch, but a female warrior with health value
5. The game has a secret script system, which can further reduce the difficulty of the game for players with average game proficiency
6. Rich levels and BGM allow you to relax and enjoy the joy of BGM

item.title: 100 Pumpkins 2
item.description:
About This Game

You've found "100 Pumpkins," now find 100 more! The second in the 100 Pumpkins series.

More pumpkins! More challenge! More puzzles! More bosses! More pitchforks! ...Did I mention more pumpkins?

In an interconnected world, you'll have to find exactly 1 pumpkin per screen to finish the game.

Key features:
Compact layout
Minimap and full map showing location and completion
Checkpoints on each screen
Return pumpkins home for item rewards like double jump
New pitchfork platform mechanic
Endings based on number of lives lost/time completed
Upgraded bosses
Now with music!

Requests from previous games realized:
Remap controls option, warping, retry faster after falling, more dynamic layouts

item.title: Divergence
item.description:
About This Game



Divergence is an immersive and thrilling gaming experience that transports players to a mysterious island shrouded in secrets and teeming with perilous robotic guardians. In this action-packed adventure, you'll step into the shoes of a fearless explorer armed with a unique time-reversing backpack, setting the stage for an epic quest like no other.



  • Petra wields the TimeSync, a backpack that empowers her to manipulate time itself. Rewind and replay your actions, strategize, and take on your adversaries with renewed precision. The TimeSync is your key to unraveling the island's mysteries.
  • Navigate treacherous terrains, engage in heart-pounding battles, and unravel the island's secrets in stunning detail.
  • Your ultimate goal in Divergence is to face off against the formidable guardian known as the Hoplite. Defeat this formidable adversary to save the island from impending doom and retrieve the coveted Heart of Kronos, an artifact of unimaginable power.

Will you have what it takes to conquer the island's challenges and uncover its hidden truths? The fate of the island rests in your hands.



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

item.title: Raincouver
item.description:
About This Game

Raincouver: Infected Descent

Welcome to Raincouver, a sprawling cyberpunk metropolis on the brink of oblivion. In this intense first-person indie experience, your world shatters as anti-vaccine extremists, known as "BioFreedom," abduct your girlfriend, accusing her of carrying a cybernetic virus. With the city falling into chaos, the government races to eliminate the threat, setting the stage for a desperate mission to rescue your loved one before Raincouver is reduced to ashes at ground zero.

Raincouver: Infected Descent thrusts you into the heart of a decaying cityscape overrun by cybernetic zombies. As a lone hero armed with determination and an arsenal of upgradable weapons, you must navigate treacherous environments, battling both the infected hordes and the ticking clock. Scavenge for items to boost your strength, collect precious time to extend the countdown, and strategically upgrade weapons to face increasingly relentless challenges.

In the midst of the chaos, a beacon of hope emerges‚Äîa scientist who holds the key to a cure. Your mission expands beyond the rescue as you strive to find and extract this crucial figure. Every decision counts, as you balance the urgency of saving Raincouver with the pursuit of the elusive cure.

Raincouver: Infected Descent is a challenging single-player experience that demands skill, strategy, and resourcefulness. Navigate through the darkened alleyways, abandoned labs, and infected zones, uncovering the mysteries behind the outbreak and BioFreedom's motives. Will you trust the government's draconian solution, or will you unravel the truth and forge a path to redemption?

Immerse yourself in the neon-lit despair of Raincouver, where survival means confronting both the undead and the machinations of those in power. With atmospheric visuals, pulse-pounding gameplay, and a narrative that keeps you on the edge of your seat, Raincouver: Infected Descent is the ultimate test of your skills in this cyberpunk-infested nightmare. Can you rescue your girlfriend, secure the cure, and defy the impending apocalypse? The clock is ticking, and the city awaits your descent.

item.title: Alice and The Ancients
item.description:
About This Game

The civilized world is no more, with only a horde of robots called Ancients roaming everywhere. The world is now only war and about is a battlefield. Alice is a mechanic who finds a malfunctioning tank AI on the battlefield. She repairs the AI, and together with AI, begins a journey to traverse the land of the Ancients, reaching the mythical end of the world!
How to play:
- Control the vehicle on the battlefield, find and reach the green-marked locations to move to the next map.
- In addition to the main mission, you also have a secondary mission on each map. It could be finding certain resources, escaping the battlefield within a set time, destroying designated targets, or destroying powerful Ancients of the enemy... Each map is a new experience!
- Destroy all Bunkers and ancients blocking your way!
- Collect resources, Fusion Core, Plasma Battery, and Nano Iron to upgrade and craft more weapons.
- Craft various gun towers: Novar, Plasma... for your vehicle!
- Equip additional weapons: Boom Plasma, Ground Mine, and Missile to destroy Ancients on the battlefield.
- And, of course, upgrade your vehicle even stronger with many different upgrade paths!
- Many enemy Ancients on the battlefield with different strengths that you must be careful to defeat.
- Maps full of challenges, every enemy is very dangerous!
- Simple and intuitive controls, move in four basic directions, and gun towers will move in the direction of your movement. If Ancients are nearby, your gun tower will automatically target them.
- Shoot and switch weapons flexibly to destroy enemy Ancients, and make use of the items you've collected to repair your vehicle right on the battlefield.
- You can start a new game as many times as you like, and all your resources, achievements, and upgrades will be reset!

We hope "Alice and The Ancients" will give you a new experience, fill your leisure time, and help you have a pleasant time! Thank you for reading the introduction to "Alice and The Ancients!"

item.title: SpaceDRG
item.description:
About This Game

SpaceDRG is a high-octane, motion sickness inducing action game featuring cute pixel art graphics. Fight against the letters D, R & G in a space themed 1980s retro arcade environment. Compete with friends for the top spot on online leader boards, master the art of space navigation and collect power ups to even the odds. SpaceDRG features a unique psychedelic color system which is a feast for the eyes and senses.

Become a Master of Self Control


SpaceDRG features a revolutionary convention breaking keyboard layout that encourages players to regulate emotions, resist impulsivity, and stay focused on long-term goals. Self-awareness, discipline, and aligning choices with personal values are key to success in the game.

Use Power Responsibly


SpaceDRG encourages the responsible use of in-game power. Wield power responsibly to navigate challenges. Misuse can lead to negative consequences. Recognizing the responsibility that accompanies power is essential for fostering a harmonious balance between authority and accountability.

Compete In Online Leader Boards


SpaceDRG contributes to overall societal progress by encouraging competition via online leader boards. This method has been proven to motivate players to improve continuously by using their creativity, efficiency, and resilience, while also cultivating essential skills and work ethics.

item.title: Ord-Upp
item.description:
About This Game

Ord-upp is a puzzle game where the purpose is to create words from fallings letters. A word must contain at least two letters. The longer the word is, the more points you are rewarded. The game has several levels and each level must be cleared within given time.

There is also an alternative mode where numbers and operators must be combined in a way to meet a target number.

item.title: Hockey Legacy Manager 24
item.description:
About This Game

Become the ultimate hockey general manager in Hockey Legacy Manager 24 (HLM24)! Take control of a professional hockey team and create an enduring legacy. Experience the most immersive hockey manager with features that let you dominate the league for decades!

üèí THE ULTIMATE HOCKEY GM EXPERIENCE üèí

üì± OFFLINE HOCKEY MANAGER üì±

‚¨ÜÔ∏è UNIQUE CAREER STORYLINES ‚¨ÜÔ∏è

item.title: Quest Giver
item.description:
About This Game


  • Welcome to your new job, NPC: Giving out quests to local adventurers!
  • Choose quests which are appropriate to their level to help them become mighty, and perhaps some day one of your clients will become the hero of the town.



Each With Multiple Endings:
  • Get Fired
  • Get Assassinated
  • Destroy the Entire World
  • Join a Cult
  • Start a Mutiny
  • ... and More!
(A full playthrough is 3-5 hours, a completionist run is 10+)



Featuring Responsive Dialogue:



Who each have their own:
  • Personality
  • Class & level
  • Likes & dislikes

A selection of the world's mighty heroes! (aka not you.)

Accessibility:

  • Playable with controller, mouse, keyboard, or hybrid
  • Playable with 1 or 2 hands
  • Curvy font option for readability
  • Option to adjust the text speed to show dialog fast vs. instantly

item.title: Anarchy Park
item.description:
About This Game

Step right up to the most chaotic carnival you've ever seen: Anarchy Park! Dive into a frantic fusion of isometric exploration and intense bullet-hell action.

In Anarchy Park, every twist and turn offers unpredictable challenges as you venture through a zany amusement park that's as dangerous as it is delightful. With a vibrant world painted in shades of madness, this isn't your typical day at the fair. Instead of sweet memories, you'll face four formidable bosses, each with their own unique styles and tricks up their sleeves.

Beyond the bullet hell mayhem, players will explore an amusement park searching high and low for 10 elusive stars, if you manage to collect them all, you'll be rewarded with a silly prize to add to the adventure.

Developed over 10 months with a dedication to challenge and precision, Anarchy Park provides players with a concise 2-5 hour adventure that packs a punch. Every moment in this park is meticulously crafted to test your skills, ensuring every victory feels earned.

What sets Anarchy Park apart is its distinctive 3D shooting system ‚Äì a feature seldom seen in isometric or top-down shooters. As you weave through a hailstorm of bullets and chaos, you'll need more than just quick reflexes; precision aiming and strategic planning are essential. Engage with enemies in three-dimensional space, challenging players to aim, shoot, and dodge in ways they've never done before.

So, are you up for the challenge? Do you have the grit and gumption to survive the wild rides of Anarchy Park? Step in, take aim, and let the mayhem begin!

item.title: VDSC: VoltIsland
item.description:
About This Game

Shoot your way to the top.

An Island, a bunch of dragons and guns. Volt Inu‚Äôs Sailor Club invites you to the greatest battle of your life. Fight other players for Honor, Wealth and Power. Land in strategic locations, loot weapons and supplies to survive the battlegrounds and be the last to be victorious.

As a player you have access to 3 different weapons, a jetpack and various grenades. The goal is to be the last in the area and fight the other players.

item.title: Project Subtrahend
item.description:
About This Game

You‚Äôve been invited to join Project Subtrahend. What could possibly go wrong?

‚Ä¶As it turns out, quite a lot!

In this thought-provoking choose-your-own-adventure visual novel, you‚Äôll have the chance to get to know the stories, pasts, and personalities of nine unique characters after you've all been invited to help with an innocent social experiment. Explore the deep interpersonal relationships between them, learn about the politics of their world, and explore what it means to be human.

When things start going awry, and when the true intentions of the experiment are revealed, your choices will determine the possible endings you can get. It‚Äôs up to you who makes it out alive...

With a lore-filled world, entertaining gameplay, secret endings, rewards for achievements, bonus scenes, and an hour of playtime in each route, you won‚Äôt be getting bored anytime soon as you discover everything Project Subtrahend has to offer!

Make impactful choices
When the time comes, you choose how to escape and who survives.

Befriend (or be-enemy) nine vastly different characters.
Get to know their diverse life experiences, perspectives, and relationships.

Learn about Sicknessism
A new religion has emerged in New Evenfall; you have the chance to learn about it, and maybe even join in ;)

Earn extra content
Unlock achievements to fill out each character‚Äôs scrapbook and unlock bonus post-game scenes with each character!

item.title: Hazeron Starship
item.description:
About This Game

Explore and colonize a vast universe. Twenty one galaxies filled with countless stars and planets and other things await your discovery.

Start as an indigenous person on an undeveloped world. Hunt for food. Survive wild animals. Build a home.

Discover natural resources. Build mines and wells to gather resources from the land.

Establish an empire to govern your work.

Found a city to manage its buildings. Build more buildings to manufacture things from natural resources and other things.

Advance your civilization. Make space rockets to explore space. Venture out into your home solar system.

Discover exotic natural resources in dangerous environments on other worlds. Build cities there to harvest resources and send them to factories on the home world.

Travel directly to any star in the sky using a space rocket, a daunting task.

Develop technology to make starships that can travel instantly through wormholes to other solar systems. Walk aboard them. Operate their controls. Command a crew of NPCs. Lift off. Fly up through the atmosphere to outer space. Land on other worlds, anywhere, not at designated places.

Discover natural resources on other worlds, on land, beneath seas, in rings like those of Saturn, in coronas of stars, and in seas of liquefied gases on giant worlds like Jupiter.

Design unique spacecraft and buildings with the built-in 3D modeler. Make them function, with operable doors, landing gear, lights, turbo lifts, transporters, engines, shields, weapons, and more. Share your designs with others in the Steam Workshop.

Not everyone is a 3D modeler; it is not easy. The Steam Workshop offers a growing assortment of fantastic spacecraft and buildings designed by people with a gift for 3D modeling. Their work is there for you to enjoy.

item.title: LOFI Katana
item.description:
About This Game



Play the beats you usually study/relax to! üìö
LOFI Katana is a VR rhythm game with a unique atmosphere inspired by everyone‚Äôs favourite late night playlists.
Leave your room and head to the highest rooftop. Find your musical sanctuary away from the city noise. Hit the shurikens with your katana and wave your fan to the rhythm of the music.

Don‚Äôt stop the music!

After mastering all the songs in the game, generate your own gameplay based on your favourite music. LOFI Katana uses a sophisticated procedural system that analyses the song and creates custom levels matching the rhythm and beat of any track.

Gameplay

Enjoy your music with simple but challenging sequences that blend dance and combat:
  • In Classic mode, flip your fan to match the incoming ones, and wield a katana in your other hand to slice the flying shurikens coming towards you.
  • Select your difficulty level, from a calm and relaxing routine to a more challenging and energetic session.
  • Try out the alternative modes: ‚ÄúOnly Fans‚Äù and ‚ÄúOnly Katanas‚Äù for a new take on the Classic gameplay.
  • LIV integration available for streamers and influencers who like to dance and move along with their favourite music!






The light and the environment around you change procedurally with the music. Feel free to take some time to relax and enjoy the cosy vibes.
Experience the atmosphere around you reacting to your actions and immerse yourself in the flow of your favourite tracks.
To integrate your music, you will simply need to drag your MP3 or WAV files into the /Tracks folder of the game. Our Algorithm itself will take care of creating a deterministic gameplay from the song and generating a level from the parameters you have chosen.

If you are looking for an escape to a relaxing world, this is the perfect game for you!



Music Trailer: Forest Shrine by Kerusu
